metadata.synopsis: Toobin thanks the player for his help. If the the player has earned gondian support, Toobin also swears to back them up in the END fight.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ause the debugbook to set up that the gondians are saved, and to teleport to the control centre of the foundry use "oe LOW_GiveBomb"go to the boss room on the floor and kill the bossesgo to the switchboard and use the bomb in the dialog to blow up the foundrygo through the outcome dialog, and side with the gondiansonce the dust settles, talk to Toobin

0.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
0.text: We need time to recuperate and rebuild, but the Gondians will survive - thanks to you.
0.context: NodeContext: determined, proud to call the player friend

1.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
1.text: While I cannot see it, I can feel the sun's embrace - and it is nothing short of divine. Thank you for doing the impossible, my friend. Simply call, and the Gondians will come - I swear it.

2.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
2.text: I think it is past time Obelia and I left this city - there is nothing for us here now.

3.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
3.text: I think it is past time I left this city - there is nothing for me here now.

4.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
4.text: I pity Wulbren - his brilliance was dazzling, but his mind was ruined by hatred. Thank you - for standing with us. Simply call, and the Gondians will come - I swear it.

5.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
5.text: I stand when so many have died. I thank you for what you have done for us, but I fear the Gondians are no more. At least no one else will suffer under the Steel Watch.

6.speaker: Gondian Zanner Toobin
6.text: An alliance with the Ironhands? I didn't think it possible. The Gondians are in your debt, my friend. Simply call, and we will be by your side - I swear it.
6.context: NodeContext: admiring, proud to call player friend
